department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 18/04/2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for Aircraft Charter Services.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation for Aircraft Charter Services

**Reference Number:** WS3753315787
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-07

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for Aircraft Charter Services. The services are required to support various government operations across Canada.

**Important Tender Details:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** April 18, 2024 (14:00 EST)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Key Criteria:**
* Lowest Price

**Deliveries:**
The successful contractor will be required to deliver services across Canada.

### Request for Information
The solicitation is for a Request for Standing Offer, with a competitive-open bidding process.

### Tenders and Attachments
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted to [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/procurement-canada/service-provider Directory) and [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/) by the closing date. Unsuccessful bidders will be notified via the suppliers' online profile.

**Final Note:**
A previous public notice provided a municipally incorrect closing time, therefore disregard such notification.
